author: Special Correspondents
text:
Haj aspirants who have already applied for passports but were yet to receive the same even after completion of police verification may contact the Regional Passport Office, Tiruchi, S.Lingasamy, Regional Passport Officer, has said.

In a release Mr. Lingasamy pointed out that the Haj Committee has fixed February 8 as the last date for submission of applications along with passport details.

Considering the limited time available, all genuine Haj aspirants can approach the Regional Passport Officer at Marakkadai and get manual tokens for submission of applications on walk-in basis.

Such applicants should come to the office with copies of the online application farms (ARN sheets), Mr. Lingasamy said.

Apart from this, a special Haj Helpdesk will function at the Regional Passport Office in Tiruchi till February 8 for answering queries related to passport applications, status enquiry and grievances of prospective Haj pilgrims, he said.
title: Haj passports
